abstract: Ligaya Mishan reviews the Food Sermon restaurant in Crown Heights, Brooklyn.
lead_paragraph: The Brooklyn restaurant offers Caribbean cuisine that will have you believing that food is a matter urgent for the soul.

headline.main: At the Food Sermon, Keeping the Faith in Crown Heights
headline.print_headline: Keeping the Faith in Crown Heights

snippet: The Brooklyn restaurant offers Caribbean cuisine that will have you believing that food is a matter urgent for the soul.
